description:
Summary:
If you try to transfer money using Mobile Number, a Snackbar appears with a wrong error message.

Steps to reproduce:
Payments -> Send -> Mobile Number -> Add an amount -> Type the mobile number -> Submit

Expected behavior:

An error message saying "Error finding Mobile Number" should be displayed.

Observed behavior:

An error message saying "Error finding Virtual Payment Address" is displayed.

Device and Android version:
Mi A2
Android 9 Pie
name: Mifos Pay Bug: Wrong error message while sending money using Mobile Number
